snippet.title: The Bakerville Case - Technical Features Showcase Trailer
snippet.description:
Introducing the official Unity Technical Features Showcase Trailer, in which we show functions in action and comparisons of technical functions and graphics such as Ray Tracing, FSR 2 and much more.

Ray Tracing: 0:16
Volumetric Elements: 0:52
Reflections: 1.15
AMD FidelityFX Super Resolution 2: 1:40
Immersive Effects: 1:51
NVIDIA Reflex: 2:13
Environments: 2:26
Additional Features: 2:44

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2140620/The_Bakerville_Case/

Get ready for a first-person horror, adventure and survival experience, enter the darkness in this adventure inspired by true events and enjoy incredible graphics generated in real time with Unity engine. Play as Thomas Baker and explore Bakerville to discover the terrible evil that resides there.

The Bakerville Case is inspired by the true events of the secret 1950s "MK Ultra" program, to build a haunting and mysterious story that can be complemented as the player explores the playable environments.

You are Thomas Baker, a journalist who, after being contacted by an anonymous source, travels to a town to investigate a series of horrifying unknown events.
In a town located in North America called Bakerville, terror and evil wait to be found. According to the anonymous source, an unknown group is performing horrifying experiments on the people of the town, and the center point of all of it seems to be a nearby psychiatric hospital.
Thomas arrives in Bakerville to discover the terrifying mystery at the heart of the town, but he was never going to imagine what he would find in that place.
